title: Smart Data models - Measurement schema,
description: Description of a generic measurement entity coming from a device or other data source.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Measurement

numValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Numerical value of the measurement

textValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Textual value of the measurement

controlledProperty.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Property being measured by the device

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

deviceType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of device taking the measurement

measurementType.description: Property. The type of measurement to be taken

dateObserved.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format

outlier.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'. Value for marking the measurement to be specially processed
